# JSON Editor Streamlit App Project

## Project Overview
This is a Streamlit application that provides a dynamic JSON editor interface. The app automatically detects JSON file structures and provides an intuitive interface for editing them.

## Project Status
- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [x] Launch the Project - Fixed form/button conflicts, app is functional
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete - README.md created with full documentation

## Requirements
- Streamlit application for JSON file editing ✅
- Automatic detection of JSON file structures ✅
- Dynamic form generation based on JSON schema ✅
- Modular and adaptable to any JSON format ✅
- Easy to use interface for tweaking JSON data ✅

## Usage
Run the application with:
```bash
streamlit run json_editor.py
```

The app will automatically detect and load JSON files from your specified directory and provide an intuitive editing interface.
